rules_text:
As long as there are no non-Invocation creatures on the battlefield, Existential Dread is a creature in addition to its other types.
Invoke {2} [i]({2}: This Invocation becomes an enchantment creature until end of turn.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Existential Dread phenomenon, feelings of horror

Mechanical Uniqueness — Invocation type and mechanic by Shadow123

Could increase invoke cost
